sentences.english: Indian soldiers at the Buddhist monastery in Tawang, India, in June.
sentences.chinese: 6月的达旺，印度士兵在一所佛教寺院中。

sentences.english: Many adornments were carved on the temple walls.
sentences.chinese: 寺院的墙壁上刻著很多装饰物。

sentences.english: So Master Sugehara named his temple "The Date Monastery".
sentences.chinese: 长老遂把自己住持的寺院更名为枣寺。

sentences.english: So that’s why Hu loved going to the temple.
sentences.chinese: 这是胡很喜欢去寺院的原因。

sentences.english: There you hear the faint sound of children's laughter and birds’ singing.
sentences.chinese: 寺院里你微微听见孩子们的笑声和鸟儿的鸣声。

sentences.english: From the top floor tower overlooking the temple.
sentences.chinese: 从振风塔顶层俯瞰寺院。

sentences.english: You can see gompas all around the periphery of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 人们还可以在湖的周围看到很多寺院。

sentences.english: I am also opposed to the indoctrination of children in monasteries .
sentences.chinese: 我也反对以教条式的儿童在寺院中。

sentences.english: B:And the temple is very famous in China.
sentences.chinese: 而且这个寺院是中国非常有名的。

sentences.english: It is a famous temple in China. It was built in ancient times to house the fingerbones of Sakyamuni, the founder of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 它是我国古代安置释迦牟尼佛骨舍利的著名寺院。

sentences.english: Complex of monasteries in Kotaik province.
Their temple was thousand miles away from the Putuo Temple .
sentences.chinese: 寺院距离普陀寺有数千里之遥。

sentences.english: The study on temple economy is an important field of religion.
sentences.chinese: 寺院经济研究，是宗教学研究的重要领域。

sentences.english: The economic documents of Dunhuang temples reflect the civil accounting thoughts during the period of Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌寺院经济文书体现了唐五代时期的民间会计思想。

sentences.english: Existing temple in nuns hundreds of people, 48.
sentences.chinese: 现存寺院48处，僧尼数百人。

sentences.english: Two monks are on a day-long walk to a temple.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，两个僧人长途跋涉要到一个寺院去。

definition: Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
stupa/tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha
